document.description: Client Sociodemographic and Service Receipt Inventory (CSSRI - EU) - Follow Up

basicentry.description: Has your living situation changed at all since I saw you 6 months ago?

translation.description: Translation for 0 or 2 to option 0. No
Translation for option 1. Yes

basicentry.description: What is your usual/normal living situation now?

translation.description: Translation for option 1. Living alone (+/- children)
Translation for option 2. Living with husband/wife (+/- children)

translation.description: Translation for option 1. Domestic / family - Owner occupied flat or house
Translation for option 2. Domestic / family - Privately rented flat or house
Translation for option 3. Domestic / family - Rented from local authority/municipality or housing association/co-operative

Translation for option 8. Hospital - Rehabilitation psychiatric ward
Translation for option 9. Hospital - Long-stay psychiatric ward
Translation for option 10. Hospital - General medical ward
Translation for option 11. Homeless / roofless
Translation for option 12. Other
